New Records: India completed a clean sweep of the series
Key Match Events: The match went into a Super Over with India winning by 2 wickets in the last ball
Washington Sundar was named Player of the Match for his all-round performance
Suryakumar Yadav hit a crucial boundary off Maheesh Theekshana's carrom ball to secure the victory
Pathum Nissanka was dismissed in the deep by Rinku Singh in the final over
Sri Lanka were undone by complacency and poor shot selection towards the end
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and opted to bowl first
The match was played at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy
Head-to-head statistics showed India leading the series 3-0
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka, Sri Lanka's captain, expressed disappointment with the batting performance
Washington Sundar praised the team's resilience and skill
Sri Lanka's middle order and lower order batsmen contributed significantly but lost focus
The series win was a pivotal moment for India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The presentation ceremony featured player interviews and reflections on the match
Historical comparisons were made to previous high-scoring matches between the two teams
Others: Live streaming and telecast details were provided for the match
Player statistics and performance metrics were mentioned
